meanings.definition: Unauthorized copies of software or media distributed online.
meanings.sent1: The warez were easily accessible on the internet.
meanings.sent2: I found some warez on a website yesterday.
meanings.sent3: The pirate ship was full of warez, but not the kind you buy in a store.
meanings.sent4: Her computer was a treasure chest of warez waiting to be discovered.
meanings.sent5: The warez market was booming with all sorts of digital treasures.

meanings.definition: To illegally download or distribute copyrighted material.
meanings.sent1: He decided to warez the latest movie instead of going to the cinema.
meanings.sent2: She was caught warez-ing music from the internet.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to warez the fish from the bowl when no one was looking.
meanings.sent4: The idea warez-ed through his mind like a virus infecting his thoughts.
meanings.sent5: The forbidden fruit of warez tempted him with its allure.

meanings.definition: The act of sharing or obtaining pirated software or media.
meanings.sent1: Engaging in warez is against the law.
meanings.sent2: He was involved in the warez scene for a while.
meanings.sent3: The warez party was raided by the authorities before it even started.
meanings.sent4: The warez exchange was like a black market for digital goods.
meanings.sent5: The dark alley was a hub for warez transactions under the cover of night.
